item.title: Increasing Drop ratio of bandos [PI] REP++
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

[quote=“collin123456, post:8, topic:397732”][quote author=oldschool-scape link=topic=494869.msg3618026#msg3618026 date=1307147753]

hey ppl, i was just wondering cuz my bandos boos never drops a thing
how i could increase it

heres my bandos drop .TSM

2550:1 2679:1 829:1 391:2 385:2 564:50 1249:1 3052:3 892:75 1303:1 808:100 1602:3 1917:1 1971:1 1514:16 1319:1 1275:1 3024:3 1606:3 454:150 560:100 563:50 561:75 1373:1 1127:1 5300:2 2440:3 1604:3 1452:1 995:1000000 1149:1 830:5 1079:1 886:100 1608:3 985:1 987:1 11712:1 11728:1 11714:1 11724:1 11704:1 11710:1 15316:1 2677:1 2678:1

ye i know the number have to be 100 for chances, so i did it without any succes.

anyone know how to make it drop??

try that?

why should 1% work?

well atleast i could try
[/quote]
ive always thought the lower the number the more often it drops, because when mines on 1 it drops often, at 100 ive nvr gotten it[/quote]

fucking working bro
u urned a big fat rep++

Read full topic
